pullRequest.title: Simplify defaultGameChooser file construction
pullRequest.bodyText:
commit cd70886
Simplify ResourceLoader, simplify nullity & remove search for 'dependencies.txt'

1. MapName is never null, if it were then ResourceLoader would go on to throw a NPE.
2. No map has a 'dependencies.txt' file, the search for it is unnecessary.

commit ac5037c
Simplify, move error handling to ShallowGameParser

Release Note

commit.message:
Simplify ResourceLoader, simplify nullity & remove search for 'dependencies.txt'

1. MapName is never null, if it were then ResourceLoader would go on to throw a NPE.
2. No map has a 'dependencies.txt' file, the search for it is unnecessary.
Simplify, move error handling to ShallowGameParser
Mark exception variable as final per checkstyle rules

nodes.bodyText:
Wait what?
Does any map even use this?
